title: Legion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- A random Legion decides to kill someone each night.
- If a player is voted on by only Cult of the Clocktower roles or roles that can win with them, the execution fails.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a Legion spawns, random slots are converted into Legion slots until the majority of slots are Legion.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
